QuestData.Title: Time Keeper Kairoz
QuestData.Description: You have found your way to the Timeless Isle, $c. The bronze dragonflight is keen to investigate the mysteries of this place, but the island is dangerous, and we will need your help.$B$BMidway up this beach, you will find a paved path to the east.$B$BIt will lead you to the ancient Celestial Court. You will find Kairoz there, one of the Keepers of Time that we are working with.$B$BKairoz will answer any questions you might have. Be careful: The way may not be safe.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Kairoz on the Timeless Isle.
